COPSmessage PDPchild::Receive (  unsigned long  timeout = 0  ) 
 

Receives messages from the PEP This function will block in order to read a full COPSmessage

Parameters:
timeout amount of time the socket will block looking for new messages (ALL EXCEPT CLOSE and KEEP ALIVE)
Returns:
COPSmessage received
